definition[0]: when you put things into cases or boxes so that you can send or take them somewhere
example[0]: I can do my packing the night before we leave.
definition[1]: the material used for packing things so that they can be sent somewhere
definition[2]: the process of wrapping goods or putting them in boxes, ready to be sent somewhere
example[2]: Tetra Pak have ruled out any interest in packing or distributing non-foods.
definition[3]: a list of goods that have been packed and are ready to send
example[3]: The packing list read ‘Parts for a Dairy Plant’, but the contents were high-quality steel components more suited to weapons.
definition[4]: materials such as paper, card, plastic etc, used for packing things
example[4]: Farmingdale, N.Y., the maker of paperboard packing
